product_name: ClarinsMulti-Active Day Moisturizer for Lines and Glow with Niacinamide
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackClarins Multi-Active Day Moisturizer for Lines, Pores, Glow with Niacinamide targets first signs of aging to visibly smooth lines, refine pores, and help strengthen moisture barrier for a healthy glow.
details: DetailsBenefitsVisibly smooths lines, refines skin texture, and boosts radianceHelps reinforce skin's moisture barrierEvens skin tone and visibly tightens poresTargets first lines and wrinklesKey Ingredients2% Niacinamide: visibly smooths fine lines and refines skin textureOrganic Sea Holly Bio-Extract*: helps to reinforce the skin's moisture barrierOrganic Strawberry Tree Fruit Extract*: refines skin texture and visibly tightens poresBetaine: moisturizes and plumps the skin's surfaceAnti-Pollution Complex of Organic White Horehound, Furcellaria and Nipplewort Extracts: help minimize damage from environmental pollutants including skin-aging blue lights from electronics*Organic ingredients are produced in accordance with European regulation (CE 2018/848).Research ResultsProvides 24-hour hydration*, 34% visibly reduced fine lines & wrinkles*, 46% visibly reduced signs of fatigue*98% skin is more hydrated**, 93% skin is smoother**, 92% skin is firmer**, 91% skin is more radiant**, 86% skin texture is refined and more even**10.8% visibly minimizes pores***92% boosts glow*****Clinical study - all skin types - 30 women - 24H**Consumer test - all skin types - 105 women***Clinical study with 32 women after 28 days****Consumer test with 107 women after 28 days using Multi-Active Day and Night duoItem 2620943How To UseSmooth over clean face and neck each morning.Apply with gentle press-and-release movements, avoiding the eye contour area.Work downward, over neck and décolleté.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Glycerin, Betaine, Cetearyl Alcohol, Niacinamide, Dimethicone, Glyceryl Stearate, Peg-100 Stearate, Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/Vp Copolymer, Cetearyl Glucoside, Propylene Glycol, Parfum/Fragrance, Caprylyl Glycol, Dipsacus Sylvestris Extract, Hydroxyacetophenone, Mica, Ci 77891/Titanium Dioxide, Polysilicone-11, Chlorphenesin, Tocopheryl Acetate, Butylene Glycol, Disodium Edta, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Citric Acid, Tocopherol, Eryngium Maritimum Extract, Marrubium Vulgare Extract, Phenethyl Alcohol, Decyl Glucoside, Furcellaria Lumbricalis Extract, Sodium Citrate, Arbutus Unedo Fruit Extract, Lapsana Communis Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Maris Sal/Sea Salt/Sel Marin, CI 17200/Red 33, [V4298A].Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Smooth over clean face and neck each morning.Apply with gentle press-and-release movements, avoiding the eye contour area.Work downward, over neck and décolleté.

reviews.headline: not sure
reviews.comments: I'm having a lot of break outs with this product going to give it one more week and it might have return it..  I have quite a few Clarion products usually  I have the best results.

reviews.headline: I would purchase this again
reviews.comments: Makes your skin feel refreshed and soft.  I would definitely recommend and purchase again.  Thank you to the sales rep. that demonstrated and recommended.

reviews.headline: Not meant for younger skin
reviews.comments: Got this because I was noticing my skin loosing elaasticity and had 11 lines (29yr). It caused redness on my cheeks. Product was way too heavy. I have combindation type skin. This product might be better for 50+

reviews.headline: THE FRAGRANCE IS TOO STRONG
reviews.comments: I usually don't mind fragrance in cosmetics and skincare products but the fragrance in this is so strong it will irritate your eyes if it gets near your eye area which is not ideal for when you do not have time/money to apply an eye cream separately. It's not a nasty fragrance but it is very irritating to the eyes, but if you happen to get it near the corners of your mouth it will gross you out... it's inconvenient because other facial moisturizers for the same price aren't this much of a hassle. I like Clarins but they need to tone down the fragrance in their facial products.

reviews.headline: I will buy this product again and again
reviews.comments: Excellent product u can see the results immediately

reviews.headline: I have used this product for a long time.
reviews.comments: My face is sensitive and oily to normal. This one moisturizer does it all for me. I'm scared to change.

reviews.headline: Amazing day moisturizer
reviews.comments: This is an amazing day moisturizer that adds glow, is lightweight but has a luxurious, thick feel to it, smells heavenly (but very light). Filled with natural extracts and antioxidants, it has made a day for my combo skin in late 30s. My skin looks renewed: plump and radiant. Overall, this is better than many other more expensive options and even produces better anti-aging effects on my skin, compared to Clarins' own anti-aging line. I have purchased 3rd jar, and will probably stick with it moving forward as it is very good for my sensitive skin and doesn't clog pores, irritate, or dry it. Love it!!!

reviews.headline: On the fence
reviews.comments:
I am 55 with very dry skin. I tried this with the other Clarin's serums and even topped it with a vitamin C oil. I dont think it will work for winter. And, I dont see it working for a nightine cream during the winter. It would be a nice moisturizer for summer I believe if you have dry skin. 
For all the other skin types it might work well for you.

reviews.headline: Love this product
reviews.comments: I really love this product. I've alternated between a variety of higher end brands over the last 14 years and this is my favorite, and I have tempermental skin. It's so worth it.

reviews.headline: Smells AWFUL
reviews.comments: Smells absolutely awful. Like the most old-fashioned, cheap perfume. This is meant to be a day cream… I don't know why it smells so incredibly strong and cheap.  I also think I mistook Ulta's "conscious beauty" as meaning clean/good skincare.  But that is not what this is. Its full of synthetic/artificial crap… including dyes and fragrance.

reviews.headline: Disappointed
reviews.comments: I was really excited to try this cream and the first few days it was perfectly fine, until my face started to breakout really bad and still have some scars :(

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: This has become my go to moisturizer, it has helped with my pores and fine lines alot. I'm 52 but still get oily in my T-Zone. I am surprised by the negative reviews. Its a winner in my book

reviews.headline: Meant for mature skin
reviews.comments: I wouldn't recommend this product for women in their late 20s-30s. Its more meant for women in their 40-50s I believe. It was too harsh on my skin. Made my cheeks have a red pigmentmentation and sometimes burned. I dont use it everyday because of it which is ashame because of the price.

reviews.headline: Overwhelming fragrance
reviews.comments: I received a Clarins set as a bonus with purchase.  I first tried this products.  The fragtance is so strong snd overwhelming thst my eyes became irritated.  I am not usually sensitive to anything.  Clarins, you do. It beed to add this much fragrance.  I am afraid it might keep me from sleeping.

reviews.headline: Not a fan
reviews.comments: I used the old formulation and loved it very much. But this new formulation is heavy and makes my face feel greasy. Plus it's making me break out big-time with  large cyst like acne that I've only ever gotten from cheaper brand moisturizers. will be returning...

reviews.headline: it's just ok
reviews.comments: I was in love with the previous formula,  but this one isn't the same. It feels heavier and makes my face oily. which is causing me to break out which I hadn't with the previous formula.

media.headline: I love its texture
media.caption: I love its texture, it is soft to apply and absorbs super fast.

media.headline: A must have!
media.caption: Perfect for dry skin with its creamy texture

faceoff_positive.comments: Been enjoying this cream. I have a dry skin and during cold weather it tends to get more dry but using this cream been skin saver it hydrants my skin with a just a little for all my face. It has a creamy like texture and a little goes along and get absorbed so quickly leaving my skin feeling so smooth and looking healthy. It has a subtle scent which I love and it is very refreshing when I apply it. Highly recommend. Gifted by Clarins
faceoff_positive.headline: A must have!

faceoff_negative.comments:
I received these sample sized products for free in exchange for my honest opinion. Firstly, I adore the packaging! I am a sucker for packing! 
That is about where my love for these products end unfortunately. I did not notice any improvement in the hydration, texture, overall health of my skin while using these products. While I am open to trying skincare products with fragrance, I do prefer facial products to not have fragrance because fragrance in facial products can do more harm than good. There's literally no beneficial reason to add fragrance to facial products. This has fragrance pretty high up in the ingredients list and that is what ultimately made me not like these products on top of lack of results from the formula itself. 
The fragrance in these products bothered my eye area and I did in fact get a pimple around my eye area which is not normal for me. 
It's hard to say for sure that it was the fragrance or something else in the product that caused that to happen but for those reasons and the price I would definitely not recommend. There's less expensive products out there with and without fragrance that offer the same results.
Lack of results plus the irritation from what I assume is from the fragrance is enough for me to
Not want to repurchase or recommend. 
Maybe if you have oily to normal skin and are not acne prone and you do not have any issues and like fragrance in your facial products you MIGHT like these products. I did receive sample sizes and sometimes it takes a longer time using a product to see any visible differences/improvements.
faceoff_negative.headline: Did not like, would not recommend .

rollup.name: Multi-Active Day Moisturizer for Lines and Glow with Niacinamide
